full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'DIR DGRA LHA MCHED DGU'I BSKANG BSHAGS BSTOD PA BSKUL DANG BCAS PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @010A *, ,(DGRA LHA BSKANG GSO DKAR PO RGYAL BYED ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI RANG GI MCHED GRAGS RDO RJE ZHES BYA BAS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES TE GONG NAS YOD PA'I YIG CHA BSKANG GSO MANG THOS YANG DGRA LHA DBANG BSKYED ZHIG LA GZHIR BYAS NAS BKOD PA 'DI NI SNGAGS 'CHANG SMON LAM LHUN 'GRUB KYIS SBYAR BA'O,, ,,)
